mapper.select: SELECT A.SL_ACCOUNT AS slAccount, A.SL_TEL AS slTel, A.SL_SHOW_NAME AS slShowName, A.SL_CONTACT AS slContact, A.ACCOUNT_PSD AS accountPsd, A.ACCOUNT_IMG AS accountImg FROM sl_account AS A where A.SL_ACCOUNT=#{slAccount}
mapper.update: UPDATE sl_account SET ACCOUNT_PSD = #{newAccountPsd}, UPD_ID = #{updId}, UPD_TIME = now() WHERE SL_ACCOUNT = #{slAccount}
